predicate.note: Frames file for 'rock' based on transformation of 'shake' file.

example.name: ergative
example.text: The walls shook; the building rocked.

example.name: agentive
example.text: Speaking to reporters this week after Bank Bumiputra's shareholders approved a rescue plan, Tan Sri Basir said heavy lending to the property sector rocked the bank when property prices in Malaysia plummeted in 1984-85.
example.arg: heavy lending to the property sector
when property prices in Malaysia plummeted in 1984-85
